name: Apple
description: A round fruit with red or green skin and a crisp flesh.

name: Banana
description: A long curved fruit that grows in clusters and has soft pulpy flesh and yellow skin when ripe.

name: Orange
description: A round citrus fruit with a tough bright reddish-yellow rind.

name: Strawberry
description: A sweet soft red fruit with a seed-studded surface.

name: Grape
description: A small juicy fruit with smooth skin, typically green, purple, or red, growing in clusters on a vine.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a rough, spiky skin and sweet yellow flesh inside.

name: Watermelon
description: A large fruit with smooth green skin, red pulp, and watery juice.

name: Mango
description: A tropical fruit with a thick skin and sweet orange flesh surrounding a large seed.

name: Blueberry
description: A small sweet dark blue fruit that grows on bushes in clusters.

name: Cherry
description: A small, round stone fruit that is typically bright or dark red.
